MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Support for large files. Added template for many storage media.

English.Char_Desc_45: File splitter with error checking support.
English.Char_Desc_80: Small program for splitting large file into pieces, with error checking support.
English.Char_Desc_250: MiniSplit is a small program for splitting large file into pieces. It supports error checking to ensure that each file parts are still in its original condition.
English.Char_Desc_450: MiniSplit is a small program for splitting large file into pieces. It supports error checking to ensure that each file parts are still in its original condition.
English.Char_Desc_2000: MiniSplit is a small program for splitting large file into pieces. It supports error checking to ensure that each file parts are still in its original condition.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: You may include MINISPLIT on any CD compilation. You may not sell MINISPLIT, it is FREEWARE!
